name: Escape The Manor (itch)
description:
You find yourself trapped inside a dark Manor.  With but a single box of matches, you wander its dark corridors and abandoned rooms. Searching for things to light, trying to find someone to help you, doing anything to get out. The noises, the creaking planks, the shaking pipes... the voices. 

Get out. 

Before you too succumb to the isolation.  Before you too find the horrors, laying in wait for you. 

Escape The Manor - is a minimalist  pixel art horror game. Filled with things to discover,  full of little frights and as well as a few jump scares here and there.  

Get it now and see if you can Escape The Manor.
